categories: Category:World of Reading Star Wars Rebels: Level 2

nodes.text: Kanan's Jedi Training is a young reader's World of Reading book by Elizabeth Schaefer from the Star Wars Rebels series that focuses on Jedi Kanan Jarrus. Released on August 4, 2015, the book adapts the Star Wars Rebels episode "Path of the Jedi."

Meet Kanan--the rebels' leader and a skilled Jedi. Kanan has never taught anyone else in the ways of the Force. But after meeting a promising young boy named Ezra, Kanan decides to train him as a new Jedi. This Level 2 early reader follows Kanan and Ezra as they learn what it means to be a Jedi, together.
